content: warm the line beanie by rosemary romi hill this hat is a gift from me to you designed for the #warmtheline 2020 election project knit one or two or three up and keep someone warm while they wait in line to vote shown as a slouchy beanie this hat can also be a quicker knit with a closer fit it s simple with just a wee bit of interest to keep you going thank you for supporting indie knitwear design you can contact the designer at help@designsbyromi com or get assistance and friendship on the @romi s studio ravelry forum use hashtags #romihill #romiphyle or #warmtheline to connect on social media a 09282020 size medium measurements circumference 22 inches/approx 56 cm length 10 inches/approx 25 cm materials shown chicken coop dyeworks beak dk 50% superwash merino 50% silk 231 yards/100g color duchess one skein 3/4 of skein used 1 -
